subject: Fwd: Thanks, we are ready to lend some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this tender will expire NOW):
 
$485,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this easy form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://ouarxqrpon.com/
